pr_title: New messages for cookie SameSite attribute in WebContainer

timeline.bodyText:
change
A cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
to
A {0} cookie name with the existing SameSite attribute value {1} is configured the with the {2} new value.  No SameSite attribute is added for this cookie.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1603,3 +1603,18 @@ exception.occurred.while.running.ServletContainerInitializers.onStartup.useracti
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping=CWWWC0002W: No servlet definition is found for the {0} servlet name in the {1} filter mapping.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.explanation=The servlet name is used in filter mapping, but its definition has not been defined.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.useraction=Define the servlet which is used in the servlet name filter mapping.
+
+# {0} Cookie name that has conflict SameSite attribute
+# {1} current SameSite attribute value
+# {2} new SameSite attribute value
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name=CWWWC0003W: A cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.

timeline.bodyText:
change
A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.
to
A cookie name cannot have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute is not added for the cookie.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1603,3 +1603,18 @@ exception.occurred.while.running.ServletContainerInitializers.onStartup.useracti
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping=CWWWC0002W: No servlet definition is found for the {0} servlet name in the {1} filter mapping.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.explanation=The servlet name is used in filter mapping, but its definition has not been defined.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.useraction=Define the servlet which is used in the servlet name filter mapping.
+
+# {0} Cookie name that has conflict SameSite attribute
+# {1} current SameSite attribute value
+# {2} new SameSite attribute value
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name=CWWWC0003W: A cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.

timeline.bodyText:
what are SameSiteCookies_Lax, SameSiteCookies_None and SameSiteCookies_Strict ?


Does "values" refer to SamSite attribute values ?
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1603,3 +1603,18 @@ exception.occurred.while.running.ServletContainerInitializers.onStartup.useracti
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping=CWWWC0002W: No servlet definition is found for the {0} servlet name in the {1} filter mapping.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.explanation=The servlet name is used in filter mapping, but its definition has not been defined.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.useraction=Define the servlet which is used in the servlet name filter mapping.
+
+# {0} Cookie name that has conflict SameSite attribute
+# {1} current SameSite attribute value
+# {2} new SameSite attribute value
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name=CWWWC0003W: A cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=The deployment descriptor's context parameters cookie names and values for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists.

replies.bodyText:
SameSiteCookies_Lax, SameSiteCookies_None and SameSiteCookies_Strict are the context parameters setting in the deployment descriptor web.xml.  They take in values which are the cookie names
I changed the useraction to:
duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=The cookie name set in the deployment descriptor's context parameters for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists.
replies.author: pmd1nh

timeline.bodyText:
change
A cookie name [{0}] with duplicate SameSite attribute value [{1}] was found previously.  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
to
The {1} SameSite attribute value  already exists for the {0} cookie name.  No SameSite attribute is added for this cookie.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1603,3 +1603,18 @@ exception.occurred.while.running.ServletContainerInitializers.onStartup.useracti
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping=CWWWC0002W: No servlet definition is found for the {0} servlet name in the {1} filter mapping.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.explanation=The servlet name is used in filter mapping, but its definition has not been defined.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.useraction=Define the servlet which is used in the servlet name filter mapping.
+
+# {0} Cookie name that has conflict SameSite attribute
+# {1} current SameSite attribute value
+# {2} new SameSite attribute value
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name=CWWWC0003W: A cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=The deployment descriptor's context parameters cookie names and values for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists. 
+
+duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name=CWWWC0004W: A cookie name [{0}] with duplicate SameSite attribute value [{1}] was found previously.  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.

timeline.bodyText:

timeline.bodyText:
change
Too many wildcard cookie name configured for SameSite attribute.  No attribute will be added for any cookie.
to
Multiple wildcard cookie names are configured for SameSite attributes.  No attribute is added for any cookie.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1603,3 +1603,18 @@ exception.occurred.while.running.ServletContainerInitializers.onStartup.useracti

+# {2} new SameSite attribute value
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name=CWWWC0003W: A cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=The deployment descriptor's context parameters cookie names and values for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists.

+duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.
+duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.useraction=The deployment descriptor's context parameters cookie names and values for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists. 
+
+too.many.wildcard.configured.for.samesite.cookie.name=CWWWC0005W: Too many wildcard cookie name configured for SameSite attribute.  No attribute will be added for any cookie.

timeline.bodyText:
change
Too many wildcard cookie names are configured for multiple SameSite attributes. You can configure only one wildcard cookie name across all SameSite attributes.
to
Multiple wildcard cookie names are configured for one or more SameSite attributes. You can configure only one wildcard cookie name across all SameSite attributes.
timeline.author: dmuelle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1603,3 +1603,18 @@ exception.occurred.while.running.ServletContainerInitializers.onStartup.useracti
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping=CWWWC0002W: No servlet definition is found for the {0} servlet name in the {1} filter mapping.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.explanation=The servlet name is used in filter mapping, but its definition has not been defined.
 no.servlet.defined.for.servlet.filter.name.mapping.useraction=Define the servlet which is used in the servlet name filter mapping.
+
+# {0} Cookie name that has conflict SameSite attribute

+# {2} new SameSite attribute value
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name=CWWWC0003W: A cookie name [{0}] with SameSite attribute value [{1}] is configured with new value [{2}].  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.
+duplicate.samesite.attribute.for.cookie.name.useraction=The deployment descriptor's context parameters cookie names and values for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists. 
+
+duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name=CWWWC0004W: A cookie name [{0}] with duplicate SameSite attribute value [{1}] was found previously.  No SameSite attribute will be added for this cookie.
+duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.explanation=A cookie name must not have multiple SameSite attribute values.  The attribute will not be added for the cookie.
+duplicate.reported.for.samesite.attribute.cookie.name.useraction=The deployment descriptor's context parameters cookie names and values for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists. 
+
+too.many.wildcard.configured.for.samesite.cookie.name=CWWWC0005W: Too many wildcard cookie name configured for SameSite attribute.  No attribute will be added for any cookie.
+too.many.wildcard.configured.for.samesite.cookie.name.explanation=Too many wildcard cookie names are configured for multiple SameSite attributes. You can configure only one wildcard cookie name across all SameSite attributes.

timeline.bodyText:
change
The deployment descriptor's context parameters cookie names for 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', and 'SameSiteCookies_Strict' must be unique across all three lists.
to
Check the deployment descriptor configuration to make sure the cookie name is configured for only one of the following SameSite attribute values: 'SameSiteCookies_Lax', 'SameSiteCookies_None', or 'SameSiteCookies_Strict'.
